description: As the world’s thinnest rechargeable battery case, the mophie juice pack air is designed to virtually double the time you have to Rock, Watch, Surf and Send with your 4th Generation iPod touch. The juice pack air is a rechargeable external battery concealed inside of a protective form-fitting case for the 4th Generation iPod touch. It offers you the full protection of a hard-shell case while providing virtually twice the battery life of the iPod touch alone; all in an ultra-thin, light-weight, low-profile design.
title: Mophie Juice Pack Air Case and 1000 mAh Rechargeable Battery for iPod touch 4th Gen (Black)
